trans-unit.source:
\n

Indicates that the pipe can be used for asynchronous reading and writing.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Indicates that there are no additional parameters.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Indicates that the system should write through any intermediate cache and go directly to the pipe.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x
